create-ad.title: Create new ad

type.label: Type
type.helper: Do you want to create an ad or an article?

linked.label: Linked item
linked.helper: Do you want your ad to link to your entire institution page, or just one specific subject?

subject.label: Subject
subject.helper: Select the subject you want to advertise for.

title.label: Title
title.placeholder: Enter a title for your ad
title.helper: The title will be displayed on top of the ad.

size.label: Size
size.helper: The size your ad should be, check the preview. This also affects the price.

image.label: Image
image.placeholder: Pick an image for your ad
image.helper: The image will be displayed on the ad.

description.label: Description
description.placeholder: Enter a description for your ad
description.helper: The description will be displayed below the title.

dates.label: Select time frame
dates.helper: How long you want to book your ad for. Starting from the day after the booking until the day of your choosing, inclusive.

title.label: Title
title.placeholder: Enter a title for your article
title.helper: The title will be displayed on top of the article.

excerpt.label: Excerpt
excerpt.placeholder: Enter an excerpt for your article
excerpt.helper: This will be shown on the article card.

image.label: Image
image.placeholder: Pick a thumbnail image for your article
image.helper: The image will be displayed on top of the article and will be used as a preview image in search results.

create-ad.error-required-fields: Please fill in all required fields.
